scripts.build: pnpm --filter sound-blue build && pnpm --filter tools build && pnpm --filter dialogue build
scripts.test: pnpm --filter sound-blue test:run && pnpm --filter tools test:run && pnpm --filter dialogue test:run
scripts.test:coverage: pnpm --filter sound-blue test:coverage && pnpm --filter tools test:coverage && pnpm --filter dialogue test:coverage
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm --filter sound-blue test:e2e && pnpm --filter tools test:e2e
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter sound-blue typecheck && pnpm --filter tools typecheck && pnpm --filter dialogue typecheck && pnpm --filter @soundblue/shared exec tsc --noEmit
scripts.check:circular: pnpm exec madge --circular --extensions ts,tsx --exclude '.vinxi|node_modules|dist' apps/ packages/
scripts.validate: pnpm typecheck && pnpm check && pnpm test
